camera.name: USB Camera
camera.description: GxiVision M16 IMX298 WebCam UVC mode
camera.pipeline: pipeline: ksvideosrc device-index=0 ! image/jpeg, width=4656, height=3496, framerate=10/1 ! jpegdec ! videoconvert
camera.pipelineWindowsTest: pipeline: ksvideosrc device-index=0 ! image/jpeg, width=4656, height=3496, framerate=10/1 ! jpegdec ! videoconvert
camera.3D_comment1: horizontalOffset adjusts the parallax, positive or negative.
camera.3D_comment2: verticalOffset corrects vertical alignment of left and right image views.
